channel.title: sql on HansenHung's blog
channel.description: Recent content in sql on HansenHung's blog

item.title: 备份服务器数据库样例
item.description: 备份服务器数据库样例 mysqldump -ubumblebeeuser -hstg2mysql-1.czrdgd08qzk4.eu-north-1.rds.amazonaws.com -p -d bumblebee_bc > 20210615.bumblebee.sql # 仅备份数据表结构 mysqldump -ubumblebeeuser -hstg2mysql-1.czrdgd08qzk4.eu-north-1.rds.amazonaws.com -p bumblebee_bc > 20210615.bumblebee.sql # 备份数据表数据和结构 ls -lh # 查看备份下来的数据大小 tar -cjf b.tar.bz2 20210615.bumblebee.sql # 网络慢的，压缩一下方便下载 logout # 退出远程连接 scp username@stg2bumblebee-node-1.micai.local:b.tar.bz2 . # 拷贝到本地，.指当前目录文件
